extendedInfo.description: Electronics News is a press release platform for the electronics Industry that delivers real-time new product news to established component buying engineers and designers all over the world. Electronics News is powered by Electropages, the leading publisher of new product news.The Electronics News application brings buyers and sellers together within a dedicated professional forum that delivers the right information to the right person at exactly the right time.By using the Electronics News app, you will gain free access to the latest electronics news from distributors as well as Find Chips and other Industry manufacturers. You also gain direct access to the latest information, including exclusive content, from premiere providers such as Mouser, Farnell element-14, RS Components, Digi-Key along with options to Buy Direct from these leading distributors.There is also video section with a catalog of hundreds of educational videos designed for engineers and designers.Electropages is unique in its approach to helping electronics engineers and designers source new electronics products.Electropages will personally make sure that each enquiry has been actioned by the supplier, ensuring that you receive your samples or further specs sheets as quickly as possible.Related Industry Apps include:IntelIntel CorporationIntel ArkElectronic Design ToolsLighting TechnologiesAnalog Devices incZigbeeAvago reviews.title: Atrocious interface.
reviews.comment: Every action as per standard android interface, works differently here. I feel like fighting it, and the app is winning as I tend to just close it with frustration. It requires major UI rework. The news itself is great though.
reviews.author: Tomasz Fiszer

reviews.title: Galaxy y
reviews.comment: Good app witch has a full support from admin.outstanding reply by admin...
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good app, UI not so.
reviews.comment: The content is good. The back button is different soft back button than my android phone back button. I continue to make mistake of pressing wrong back button every time, and it tries to stop the app. Just this fix could move it to 5 star for me.

reviews.title: This looks handy
reviews.comment: Unlike EIU, which I just looked at, this works beautifully on the screen of my phone - and the content looks both relevant and interesting.   Full marks? No. Developers made a major faux pas by breaking the accustomed functionality of the Android back button. Fix that, and the fifth star is yours.

reviews.title: Great tool to drive a geek crazy!
reviews.comment: I really should give it a 4 Star because it would take a few $ Million Dollars for me to get the full potential out of this App. And all I have is a $100 and some change.  This helps. I really only use the Mouser Catalog on PAPER! But to cross reference and double check to see if something better might be around, this tool helps.  If I were dealing with more money I would be much more serious about this tool. Very handy, and could be a real money saver if you have money to save.
reviews.author: Georg Curnutt

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: App is amazing... Simply best.. This is the first time im seeing owner replying to comments. Good
reviews.author: Vishnu Lal

reviews.comment: Great App from the elusive electropages team! Downloaded their iPad App last year - Awesome!
reviews.author: A Google User
